models

Class Income

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Income

  • public class Income
extends java.lang.Object
    Income class responsible for handing logic associated with incomes.
    Author:
    Hana

    • Constructor Detail

      • Income

        public Income(java.lang.String owner,
      java.lang.String amount,
      java.lang.String tagName,
      java.lang.String date_occur,
      java.lang.String description,
      long scheduler)
        Contructor for Income class.
        Parameters:
        owner - id of the owner of this income. (the current logged in user's id is passed in)
        amount - the amount of income
        tagName - the user specified tag name associated with this income. (only 1 allowed)
        date_occur - user specified date of the income
        description - income description
        scheduler - id of the scheduler used for repeating incomes

      • Income

        public Income(java.lang.String owner,
      java.lang.String amount,
      java.lang.String tagName,
      java.lang.String date,
      java.lang.String desc)
        Overloading constructor, used for non-repeating incomes
        Parameters:
        owner - id of the owner of this income. (the current logged in user's id is passed in)
        amount - the amount of income
        tagName - the tag associated with this income. (only 1 allowed)
        date - user specified date of the income
        desc - income description

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public static boolean add(Income income)
        Adds the specified income to the db.
        Parameters:
        income - the Income object that holds data to be added to the db.
        Returns:
        true if successfully added, false otherwise

        updates the database record with the id using the values from the income object
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getIncomes

        public static java.util.List<Income> getIncomes(java.lang.String accId)
        Get all the incomes belonging to specified user. Used in displaying the list of incomes for the user (not the pie chart)
        Parameters:
        accId - id number of the account from db
        Returns:
        list of Incomes owned by the specified user.

      • getTagSum

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTagSum(java.lang.String accId)
        Parameters:
        accId - user account id as stored in the db.
        Returns:
        the list of summed values of the tag names(owned by the user) found by getTags().

      • getIncomeTags

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getIncomeTags(java.lang.String accId)
        Gets the list of the owner's current income tags, but only those with existing incomes. Used for displaying the tags on the tag cost breakdown.
        Parameters:
        accId - user account's id
        Returns:
        list of all the tag names that the user owns

      • getTags

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTags(java.lang.String accId)
        Gets the list of the owner's current income tags. Used for displaying the tags on home page.
        Parameters:
        accId - user account's id
        Returns:
        list of all the tag names that the user owns

        Returns:

        public static Income get(long incomeId)
        Get the income with id incomeId from the database
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        public boolean getScheduler()
